Description:
Successful incumbent is required to develop and execute efficient strategy for ATC Contracts & Procurement
Ultimately, position holder will work with leaders in ATC to understand the needs of our organization and ensure we achieve our supply goals in a timely & professional manner.
Will prepare, review, negotiate, and administer contracts and purchase orders thru deployment of multinational standards.
Identifying new suppliers/vendors, ensuring that all purchased products and materials meet set specifications.
Conducting effective negotiations with supplier/vendors as needed
Handle the process of pre-arrangement procurement budget in coordination with concerned stakeholders.
Performing regular evaluation to ATC suppliers/vendors vs. agreed on services.
Always ensuring approved purchases are cost-efficient and of high quality.
Provides technical support and ensure procurement basic cycle is implemented.Duties/Responsibilities: Develop and implement new efficient procurement and sourcing strategies/policies/forms, aligning with ATC involved industries and best practices
Lead the Procurement process at all stages cross-functionally with all internal and external stakeholders
Monitoring and enforcing the implementation of approved ATC’s contracts/procurement policies and procedures
Maintain weekly supplier/vendors communication channels to stay on top of all outstanding/expected orders
Ensure on-boarding documentation for all supplier/vendor have been properly completed and stored properly on the server
Prepares and administers contracts and purchase orders with specific vendors
Prepare contract change notices, and report the status of provider/supplier deliverables, to ensure services conform to the contract requirements
Negotiating contracts/prices to make professional decisions in a fast-paced environment
Confirms that all initiated contracts with vendors/suppliers’ terms, conditions and delivery dates are approved by Senior Management
Prepare and draft purchase orders and upload in the system
Prepare proposals, request quotes and negotiate purchase terms and conditions to the best interest of ATC
Regular evaluation to vendor/supplier performance and resolve issues and concerns on the spot
Inspect and evaluate the quality of purchased items and resolve shortcomings
Periodically analyze industry and demand trends and support senior management with the development and implementation of contracting/sourcing strategies
Reviews cost proposals and pricing information
Compares bids from vendors and determines, or assists with determination, to whom contracts will be awarded
Evaluates vendor proposals to ensure that all requirements are met.
Maintains database regarding vendors performance and quality of product(s).
Following up the periodic maintenance of the rented cars, providing ATC's management with detailed reports in this regard and ensure that this applies in accordance with organized standards and rules.
Performs other related duties as assigned. Skills
Skills:
A bachelor’s degree in business administration, supply chain management or a similar field preferred
Proven work experience as a Procurement Specialist or similar role (Multinational Background is a Must)
Extensive knowledge of contract principles and procedures.
Excellent communication, interpersonal and negotiation skills
Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills
Excellent administrative skills and ability to multitask
Attention to details
Must demonstrate initiative and ownership of assigned responsibilities.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office and with business application software, purchasing and resource planning systems.
